name: locate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: locate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

phrase.phrase_title: be located in, near, on, etc.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be in a particular place
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 位于…／在…附近／坐落在…（等等）

example.eg: Our office is located in midtown Manhattan.
example.egtrans: 我们的办事处位于曼哈顿市中心。

dsense.name: locate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to find or discover the exact position of something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 确定…的位置，发现…的位置

example.eg: Police are still trying to locate the suspect.
example.egtrans: 警察仍在努力寻找嫌疑人。

dsense.name: locate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to move to a place to do business

example.eg: The company hopes to locate in its new offices by June.
example.egtrans: 该公司希望在六月前搬进新的办公楼。
